content:
/>
X.i.4.C.2.e
.
When to Take Final Action on Philippine Claims
Take final action for an award, denial, or certification of pending legacy appeals on claims based on service in the Philippine Army
only
on the basis of certifications of service made by the Department of the Army on or after February 11, 1950.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C - Development of Philippine Claims
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 4, Section C
